Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before); NEW KINGDOM ?; NEW KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Fragment of magical knife
Description: Magical knives are generally made of ivory, but one also knows of several fragments in faience. This fragment, which was part of the MacGregor collection, depicts a frog, a vulture with a knife and a crouching person with the head of a lion and holding a knife in hand. The piece is distinguished by an intense blue colour.
